title: So has anybody ever done this
body:
Im honestly not sure if this even fits here, but i know it doesnt fit into gameplay,
Okay storytime, So looking me up you will see i pretty much only play girl champions (GAMER GRILLS) No just kidding, im male. Anyways, several times diamond players in norms offer to boost me for nudes and stuff. And ive gotten many skins just for acting "like a girl" (probably comes naturally because im a %%%-- gay c:) I obviously didnt get boosted because thats too far. But getting bought skins and stuff has anybody else done this {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} ?

replies.body: they obviously didnt read the rules of the internet
Or the rules of video games. Girls dont play league duh. Only grills do
That's kinda creepy and manipulative imo....
I mean not really. They offered. Its creepy to just assume someones a girl :/
It's even creepier to go along with it and abuse it to get things out of others...
I mean, sorry some people are dumb?

> [{quoted}](name=Best Kog NA,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HE3n1qrd,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-05T22:10:15.470+0000)
>
> It's even creepier to go along with it and abuse it to get things out of others...

LOL
And that's exactly why this gentleman deserves praise
Oh :C No praise for me i guess ;~;
